func.title: FindConstructionSite

param.name: definition
param.desc: id of the desired building type.

param.name: x
param.desc: Designated x-position of the construction site. Always global coordinates.

param.name: y
param.desc: Designated y-position of the construction site. Always global coordinates.

func.desc: Searches for a suitable construction site for a building of the specified type, starting at the specified position. If a site is found, the coordinates are returned in the array [x,y]. Otherwise, the function returns nil.

example.text: Searches a construction site for a hut, starting at the local position. If a site is found, construction is started.
